name: Getaway (itch) (kagygames)
description:
Getaway is a 2d pixel driving game. You are in a getaway van. Just keep driving!

This game was designed for an Android Tablet. The PC version will have incorrect aspect ratio but it should still play.

Known issues:

GAME:

  • Hidden cheat mode can result in players getting really high scores.
  • Audio volumes needs to be adjusted.

ANDROID:

  • Needs to be installed with developer mode turned on.
  • Aspect ratio was designed for Tablets (10:16) Phones might look incorrect.

PC:

  • Please bear in mind this game is designed for Android and may have unforseen issues on PC.
  • Upon first launch of the game, your Anti Virus Software may want to fight this game.

CREDITS:

Game Designed by:

ISAAC GRANSDEN

Made with Unity
